title: How to Play Guitar Hero Left Handed

steps.headline: Turn on the PS2, PS3, Wii, or Xbox 360 and put the game in.
Whether you are playing Guitar hero I, II, III, or "Aerosmith", go to the options menu by going to the main screen.
Click on game settings, then click on lefty flip.
Press the green button on the guitar to check this option.
Press red a couple of times to go back.
steps.description: You should be at the main screen. Do quick play or career, and pick your song. The guitar is flipped, so you can play the opposite way!

text: Turn on the PS2, PS3, Wii, or Xbox 360 and put the game in.  Whether you are playing Guitar hero I, II, III, or "Aerosmith", go to the options menu by going to the main screen.  Click on game settings, then click on lefty flip.  Press the green button on the guitar to check this option.  Press red a couple of times to go back. You should be at the main screen. Do quick play or career, and pick your song. The guitar is flipped, so you can play the opposite way!
